name: Raising My Beloved 2
description:
2023-03-22 What's fixed:

  • Jump scale fixed
  • Directional arrows fixed

Very early, but mostly feature complete release. Expect some jank!

What's missing:

  • Touch controls
  • Story

What's buggy:

  • Slow transitions between gameplay... I've yet to identify the cause, might just be browser limitations while rendering scenes.

Strike a pact with The Devil and raise your recently departed betrothed back to life... By racing The Devil's janky procedurally generated tracks!

All music by: DEgITx
